projects.name: B-Tap
description: A mobile app that utilizes the Nearby Connections API for instant attendance tracking in classes
Employs an advertise-discover communication model where the teacher is an advertiser and the students are discoverers
Teacher can initiate the attendance process and can also export the attendance as a CSV file; Students can mark attendance with just a tap of a button
The project was presented at the IoT Expo organized by AICTE SPICES

projects.name: Memory-Lane
projects.brief: A fullstack web app to post your memories
description: A social media web application built using MERN stack that helps in sharing your memories with the world
Users can create posts with images, like other posts, and also edit/delete their posts
Authentication is done using JWT and the password is hashed using bcrypt. Google OAuth is also implemented

projects.name: Online Chess
description: An online chess web application with single and multiplayer modes
Players can create rooms and play with their friends or play solo against the chess engine
js-chess-engine is used for AI opponent logic and to maintain the game state
Socket.io enables players to play in real-time with their friends
The project was presented at FS'tival-22 held at TCE, Madurai
